short_summary: Purchase new Treadmills and Rowers to maintain a high level of fitness and stay current with new equipment technology. Supply and delivery to Victoria, B.C. There may be a maximum of two (2) contracts awarded for this requirement.
full_summary:

###  Procurement Method 

This procurement is using a Request for Proposal method, and the lowest price will be the selection criteria.

###  Location and Trade Agreements 

*   Regions of Opportunity: None
*   Regions of Delivery: British Columbia
*   Trade agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
